entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 09:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -6.1°C
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3 except zero over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this afternoon. High plus 3 except zero over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening except snow over the Highlands this evening. Risk of a thundershower overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3 except zero along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3 except zero along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
